name: Css3-buttons
body: ## Flat CSS3 Buttons Flat buttons built from css3. #### Default Button In order to use the default button add the classes `btn` and `default` to any appropriate element ```html Button ``` #### Colored Buttons The buttons framework support 20 colors listed at http://flatuicolors.com/ To use the colored buttons simply add the color name to class ```html Turcuoise Emerald Peter River Amethyst Wet Asphalt Green Sea Nephritis Belize Hole Wisteria Midnight Blue Sunflower Carrot Alizarin Clouds Concrete Orange Pumkin Pomegranate Silver Asbesto ``` #### Button Sizes You can use the the classes `lg`, `sm`, `xs` for large,small and extra small respectively ```html Button Button Button ``` #### Round Buttons For round buttons simply add the class `rd` to the button element ```html Button ``` #### 3D Buttons To use the 3D buttons simply add `-3d` to the button's color class ```html Turcuoise ``` #### Icons - Iconic Font by Font Awesome The buttons framework uses the Font Awesome. To add icons to the button add `` Check out a full list of available icons and their class at http://fontawesome.io/icons/ ```html ``` ##### Icon position If you are adding the icon before the button text add class `left` to the i element ```html ``` If you are adding the icon after the button text add class `right` to the i element ```html ```
